titleStmt.title: The Fourth (and last) collection of poems, satyrs, songs, etc. most of which never before published.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.

I. A panegyrick on O. Cromwell ... / E. Waller--II. Oceana & Britannia--III. An essay upon the E. of Shaftsbury's death--IV. A satyr in answer to a friend--V. An historical poem--VI. The rabble-VII. The fourth satyr of Boileau to Mr. W.R., Jan. 1687--VIII. A letany for the fifth of November, 1684--IX. A short letany : to the tune of Cook-Laurel--X. An essay upon satyr / Mr. J. Dr--den--XI. The city-ballas, 1682.
